\doxysubsection{Detailed Description}
\subsubsection*{template$<$typename Tp$>$\newline
struct emsr\+::chebyshev\+\_\+v\+\_\+t$<$ Tp $>$}

A type describing the state of a Chebyshev polynomial of the third kind.
